import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const Home: React.FC = () => { return (

Blood Donation Saves Lives

Every donation can save up to 3 lives. Join our community of donors and make a difference today.

Become a Donor Check Compatibility
üíß

Why Donate?

Blood cannot be manufactured ‚Äì it can only come from generous donors. Blood is needed every two seconds for emergency treatments, surgeries, and more.

ü©∫

Am I Eligible?

Most people in good health, who are at least 17 years old, and weigh at least 110 pounds, can donate blood. Use our compatibility checker to learn more about your blood type.

üåç

Regional Impact

Different regions have different blood type needs. Check our regional distribution map to see where your donation could make the biggest impact.

Blood Donation Facts

38%
of the population is eligible to donate blood
3
lives saved with each donation
1 in 7
people entering a hospital need blood
56
days before you can donate whole blood again

Ready to Make a Difference?

Join our blood donor community today. Track your donations, set goals, and save lives.

Sign Up Now Log In
); }; export default Home;
